From the picturesque white sand beaches in Phuket to the ancient relics in Bangkok, Thailand is indeed the perfect destination for a fun-filled vacation. The sweet taste of much-famed nightlife, the delicious cuisine of Chiang Mai and the thrill of unique water sports makes this place a must-visit destination with our 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package.

Whether you spend your time witnessing the architectural brilliance of renowned temples of Wat Pho or Wat Phra Kaew, stroll around barefoot on the stretches of white sandy beaches fringed with casuarinas and palms, getting a sweet taste of Phuket after sundown at Soi Bangla or an adventurous excursion to Coral Island, this tour has everything for a perfect getaway in the tropical paradise.

Essential Tips for an Unforgettable An Tour Glimpse of 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package Experience

DURATION

4 Nights 5 Days

HOTEL CATEGORY

4 / 5 Star

PICKUP & DROP

Bangkok / Phuket International Airport

EXPERIENCE

Premium

Experience the magic of 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package, designed to showcase the best of this captivating island paradise. From cultural immersion to beachside relaxation, embark on a journey filled with unforgettable moments and lifelong memories.

From Pattaya, your journey takes you to the idyllic island paradise of Phuket, where palm-fringed beaches and turquoise waters await. Spend your days unwinding on pristine shores, snorkeling amidst colorful marine life, or exploring the island’s lush interior. Indulge in delectable seafood feasts, stroll through bustling markets, and witness breathtaking sunsets that paint the sky in hues of orange and pink with 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package.

Throughout your 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package, immerse yourself in the warmth of Thai hospitality, savor the flavors of exotic cuisine, and create memories that will last a lifetime. With each destination offering its own unique allure, this tour package promises an enchanting journey through the Land of Smiles.

Trip Highlights to 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package Itinerary

  • A perfect way to the ‘City of Angels’, Bangkok, is by experiencing vibrant streets, city skyscrapers, floating markets, and many more.
  • Get fascinated by the city that never sleeps, Pattaya, and relish the sweet taste of incredible nightlife that this place has to offer.
  • Witness the real colors of Phuket after sundown at Soi Bangla, Patong Beach with nightclubs, street performances, games, live music and so much more.
  • Dive into the adventure water sports on the Coral Island Tour and feel the thrill deep within your bones.
  • Get a thrilling safari drive through the picturesque African wilderness setting in Thailand’s greatest open zoo, Safari World.

Choose our An Tour Glimpse of 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary for Our An Tour Glimpse of 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package

DAY 1

Arrival in Phuket

  • Upon arrival at Phuket Airport, meet our local tour coordinator who will meet and greet you at the specified area and transfer you to the hotel. Check-in at the hotel and relax.
  • Overnight stay at Phuket  hotel.

DAY 2

Full day Phi Phi Island Tour

  • 07:30 Begin your day early with convenient hotel pickup in Phuket.
  • 08:30 You will be transferred to the Phuket Boat Lagoon Marina, where you can enjoy light refreshments such as coffee, tea, and snacks before embarking on your adventure.
  • 09:00 Our first destination is Maya Bay, famously known for its appearance in the movie ‘The Beach’ starring Leonardo DiCaprio. Take a refreshing swim in the crystal clear waters before we move on to other breathtaking sites including Monkey Beach, Pileh Cove, Viking Cave, and Loh Samah Bay.
  • 12:30 Afterwards, we will make a stop at Phi Phi Don Island for a delicious buffet lunch. Following the meal, we will continue our journey by speedboat to a secluded snorkeling spot where you can explore the vibrant marine life and colorful corals.
  • 15:00 Our final destination is Khai Island, a picturesque location offering pristine white sand beaches. Here, you can engage in various water activities such as swimming, snorkeling, or simply sunbathe. For those interested, there is also the option to try out additional water sports like banana boat rides or jet skiing, at your own expense.
  • 17:00 As the day comes to an end, we will return to the Phuket marina in the late afternoon. From there, you will be transferred back to your hotel via minivan, concluding our tour.

DAY 3

Half Day Elephant Sanctuary Tour

  • Today you go on a half day tour to the Elephant Jungle Sanctuary in Phuket that offer you an enjoyable opportunity to spend quality time with elephants in their natural home, as well as gain an insight into their history and behavior. After you are picked up from your place, you will drive for approximately 1 hours through scenic agricultural areas, hills, and beach, before arriving at the Sanctuary. There, you will meet your English-speaking guide and learn a little about the elephants. You will walk with your guide through the Sanctuary, where you will find free-roaming elephants and hear their individual stories. You can touch, feed, photograph, and interact with the elephants at your leisure while you learn about their lifestyle and behaviors.
  • After you have met all the elephants, you will accompany them to a nearby mud spa. Get muddy with the elephants as you apply a healthy cosmetic mud treatment to their skin. Next, you will walk with the elephants to a nearby pool and join them in the water for a refreshing bath. Take a swim and help bathe and brush the elephants while they wade through and play in the water.
  • Once the elephants are clean, you can take some final photos with them, and then it will be time to part ways with your new friend and change into some dry clothes. Finally, enjoy a delightful Thai buffet (Thai food, freshly cooked Pad Thai, and seasonal fruit) before saying one last goodbye to your new friends before being driven back to your hotel. 
  • Half Day Elephant Sanctuary Tour in Phuket -Seat in Coach (With Thai Lunch)

DAY 4

Transfer From Phuket To Krabi By Road- Half Day Krabi City Tour

  • Proceed for Krabi City Tour. Go around Krabi and then get to visit Wat Tham Sua (Tiger Cave Monastery), a quiet secluded spot where Buddhist monks practice meditation. Their living quarters are very small huts or caves in the interior of a ring of tree-covered cliffs shaped rather like a doughnut, which is reached by a short climb via well-made concrete steps leading up the outside and down to the central inner area.

Inclusions

  • 3 night of stays in Phuket
  • 2 night of stays in Krabi
  • Safari World Tickets, Bangkok – Safari Park Admission Ticket on a Shared basis and ticket
  • Coral Island Tour From Pattaya on a Shared basis
  • Phi Phi Island Tour from Phuket – Phi Phi Island with lunch by Speed Boat on a Shared basis
  • Airport transfer from Suvarnabhumi Airport to Standard hotel
  • Airport transfer from U-Tapao International Airport
  • Airport transfer from Phuket International Airport
  • Airport transfer from Phuket International Airport to Deluxe hotel
  • Stay
  • Meals
  • Transfers
  • Guide
  • Sightseeing

Exclusions

  • Any private expenses, rooms services charges
  • Any Temple entry charge
  • Anything which is not mentioned in the inclusions
  • Any Adventure Activity.

Know Before You Go

  • International/ domestic flights are not included in the package price.
  • Visa assistance will be provided but the price is not included in the package.
  • Please carry valid IDs and Thrillophilia Voucher.
  • Please note that prices are dynamic and may change in the peak season and on blackout dates.
  • Please do not litter and keep destination clean
  • The Thailand Pass is required when travelling to Thailand by air and is not included in the package.

Easy Cancellation

*31 days or more prior to departure date, Initial Booking Amount and additional amount of visa fee will be forfeited (in case visa has been applied).*Between 30–16 days : 75% of total tour cost will be charged as penalty. *Less than 15 days: 100% of total tour cost will be charges as penalty.

High Season

Prices can fluctuate during peak season dates.

Guaranteed Dates

Your selected travel dates are guaranteed. In the unlikely event of seats sold out, we guarantee +/- 1/2 days from your preferred dates.

Travel Validity

The deal is valid for travel till 30 Sep 2024.

Visa Easy

Visa assistance will be provided by our visa specialist.

Booking Policy

Initial Booking Amount – INR 15,000 per person or cancellation charges whichever is higher (non-refundable and non-transferable)
30 days prior to the departure date – 75% of the remaining tour cost.
15 days prior to the departure date – 100% of the tour cost required.
For Issuance of the Flight Tickets, we require Full Payment of Airfare.
Non- Refundable Services in the tour package have to be paid in full at the time of Booking.
Payment Policy is non-negotiable and has to be paid accordingly.

The 5 Nights 6 Days Phuket Krabi Tour Package exceeded our expectations. It offered beauty, luxury, and coastal beauty. Highly recommended!

Krishna Mishra
